---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new skill, stack support, or improvement
title: "[feature] "
labels: enhancement
---

## What

What would you like plangate to do?

## Why

What problem does this solve? How does it fit into the gate-based workflow?

## Proposed Approach

If you have ideas on implementation, describe them here. For new skills, consider:

- Should it be auto-invocable or user-triggered?
- Does it have side effects (creates files, branches, commits)?
- Which stacks should it support?

## Alternatives Considered

What else could solve this problem?
